channel.title: Help with my compiler
channel.description: Hey, i've been messing around a little bit with bluurrs client, just getting a feel for the 317 so i can eventually make my own server. basically, what i've been doing is adding customs, making npc's drop, moving npcs, making npc's sell items and what not, but i've added all this stuff, and the only problem i'm having is the fact that i CANT get it to compile. i know for a fact i have java 6.21, the newest update. if anyone could tell me what to put in the compile.bat that would be great! i read a tutorial, and got lost because i couldn't find the file path to java or whatever, considering i'm not very good with java, the tutorial didn't help much, and it was on vista and i have xp. so if someone could help me (maybe post a guide [noob/xp friendly]) that would be greatly appreciated. thanks! :)

item.title: Help with my compiler
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

[quote=“59fifty, post:5, topic:357948”]ha sorry. i’m recieving

“the system cannot find specified path”[/quote]

Well right click it, and hit edit. It should have a path like “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe”. Change that to your path, and if you are on windows xp change it to, “start javaW”. without the quote.

Read full topic

item.description:
@59fifty wrote:

Hey, i’ve been messing around a little bit with bluurrs client, just getting a feel for the 317 so i can eventually make my own server. basically, what i’ve been doing is adding customs, making npc’s drop, moving npcs, making npc’s sell items and what not, but i’ve added all this stuff, and the only problem i’m having is the fact that i CANT get it to compile. i know for a fact i have java 6.21, the newest update. if anyone could tell me what to put in the compile.bat that would be great! i read a tutorial, and got lost because i couldn’t find the file path to java or whatever, considering i’m not very good with java, the tutorial didn’t help much, and it was on vista and i have xp. so if someone could help me (maybe post a guide [noob/xp friendly]) that would be greatly appreciated. thanks!
